Favourites.Title: Mapping RGB face video data to core body temperature (RAKSHAK)
Favourites.Description: Preprocessed and augmented image datasets (resizing, flipping, brightness adjustment) to improve model robustness. Developed CNN Re-colorization approach for RGB-to-NIR image conversion, evaluated with MSE & human assessment.Applied postprocessing (joint bilateral filter, contrast/saturation adjustment) to reduce noise and enhance visibility. Built a CNN-based approach to predict temperature from images, achieving 52% accuracy.

Favourites.Title: Hashtag Analysis
Favourites.Description: Collected Tweet data using Twitter API and Web-scraping posts from Koo (twitter-like social media) to create networks around popular social topics. Analyzed the network graphs to model information spread and analyzed structural metrics (density, assortativity, centrality) to derive insights on campaign reach and social behavior.

Favourites.Title: Parsing Large scale bibliography data
Favourites.Description: Pulling data from a PubMed database and parsing required information into CSV files. Building Networks as larger as 122 million nodes from the parsed data for further analysis.

Favourites.Title: The Learners Tab
Favourites.Description: Researching existing products and getting customer requirements from university students, especially programmers. Building the app using React, Node and various public APIs.

Ml.Title: Mapping RGB face video data to core body temperature (RAKSHAK)
Ml.Description: Preprocessed and augmented image datasets (resizing, flipping, brightness adjustment) to improve model robustness. Developed CNN Re-colorization approach for RGB-to-NIR image conversion, evaluated with MSE & human assessment.Applied postprocessing (joint bilateral filter, contrast/saturation adjustment) to reduce noise and enhance visibility. Built a CNN-based approach to predict temperature from images, achieving 52% accuracy.

Ml.Title: English to Hindi Language translation
Ml.Description: Preprocessed text data with tokenization, integer encoding, padding, and batching to create a transformer-ready dataset. Explored and Experimented with various Transformer-based and Recurrent Neural Network models and referenced multiple researches of state-of-the-art Machine Translation models to build a model that can perform machine translation from English to Hindi Language at token-level while also achieving nearly 50% sentence-level accuracy.

Ml.Title: Test Case Prioritization
Ml.Description: Implemented a research, taking prioritizing test cases in a CI context as a Ranking problem and modelling a prioritizing agent in a CI environment as a Reinforcement Learning Problem. This uses one of the ranking approches discussed in the researchto build the learning model.

Ml.Title: Hashtag Analysis
Ml.Description: Collected Tweet data using Twitter API and Web-scraping posts from Koo (twitter-like social media) to create networks around popular social topics. Analyzed the network graphs to model information spread and analyzed structural metrics (density, assortativity, centrality) to derive insights on campaign reach and social behavior.

Ml.Title: Parsing Large scale bibliography data
Ml.Description: Pulling data from a PubMed database and parsing required information into CSV files. Building Networks as larger as 122 million nodes from the parsed data for further analysis.

Ml.Title: Reinforcement Learning - TicTacToe
Ml.Description: This is a simple implementation of a Reinforcement Learning agent that learns without any neural network, future searches, possible outcomes, etc. but by simple trials. This allows good performace with less computational power in simple games.

Web.Title: The Learners Tab
Web.Description: Researching existing products and getting customer requirements from university students, especially programmers. Building the app using React, Node and various public APIs.

Web.Title: 3D Portfolio Website
Web.Description: A portfolio website built on react-three-fiber (a react renderer for Three.js). It has a 3D office room design which can be explored and has portfolio details displayed in objects around the room. Starts with a normal 2D portfolio website on home URL with the 3D website accessible a another route.

Web.Title: Github Repo Organizer
Web.Description: A simple yet great way to organize your repositories in github. This supports automatic grouping of the repos based on a specified naming convention and an easy-to-navigate view which makes it easy to go through your repositories

Web.Title: Art Showcasing Website
Web.Description: A Website design for Art showcase that support user authentication, categorizing, tags, likes, etc using React and firebase. [In-progress]

Web.Title: 3D Room Design
Web.Description: A simple 3d room design made entirely using HTML and CSS, without any Javascript or 3D libraries like threejs.

Others.Title: Remote Mouse
Others.Description: An android application to use on an android phone as an air mouse pointer for a computer. Uses bluetooth to transfer data to the computer server from android device through sockets.

Others.Title: X-86 Architecture Operating System
Others.Description: Built a basic operating system which boots in 32-bit mode and has a keyboard driver for inputs and VGA driver for output. Also has a shell which performs very basic tasks.

Others.Title: Edge based knowledge inference for intelligent vehicular networks
Others.Description: Experimented with approaches to reduce the amount of data transfered between vehicles and Road-Side-Units(RSUs) to reduce the processing power required at RSUs and make it possible to perform calculations on Lower layers instead of data transfers at higher levels.
